column4: How can I use desktop bluetooth to transmit music to bluetooth cell phone?
you need to pair your phone with the computer, use the bluetooth icon to "setup a new device"
After that?
Is it part of "Setup a new device" ?

go through the wizard and complete it, then right lick on the bluetooth icon, hover over your phone's entry and select browse, should open the phone files in the file manager and you can copy stuff to it
yes, click it and complete the wizard
I want music file to be played via desktop...
are you trying to trasmit a file or use the desktop as a "bluetooth speaker" ?
Yes, thats what I asked.. to transmit music ..
as in copying the file? i told you how
I would like play music files on cell phone by desktop bluetooth
PLAY the music on desktop speakers or COPY IT to desktop harddrive?
Its not about file transfer is different... its like using cellphone playing songs of desktop pc w/o the exitence of audio file on cellphone..
Hold on.. let me clrarify it better..
streaming the music from the cellphone to the desktop ?
Now you get that.. :)
Or even vice-versa
ok, use blueman, there's a plugin included for that
Where I can find that? Its part of package?
What is the plugin name?
i don't remember
